post.body: i gave up coffee no prob - internet is my addiction!
whatever is now doesn't mean it is that way forever. Anything is possible.
http://twitpic.com/ynoi - Aaaw please stroke and give a get well kiss from me.
I live in a so called socialist country - Austria. But earn as much as I like, have private dr etc. Pay more tax but am happy
I just added you as my friend on facebook - now i want the prize!
so do I! I've never made an amazon sale but I have made other affiliate sales
Currently Browsing: http://mimitanner.blogspot.com/
Great news about 900 subscribers @TubeNinjaTV!
I have to get to the shops - nothing in the house. The internet is so addictive - I need to take my own advice about breaking habits LOL
Morning - ordering a washing machine - hope they'll deliver today & testing ustream for event with @ScotMckay & @EmilyMcKay
Happy twitter year! Please can you rate my video I made yesterday about feeling bad http://tinyurl.com/6tlz8u
Guten Rutsch ins neue Jahr everybody - it's German it translates into have a good slide into the new year!
My teenage girl twins are out loose in their first pair of high heels.
Anyone familiar with video distribution? i find traffic geyser is best service even though it costs more than the others.
LOL I've got washing machine blues
This is emabarrsing because now I'm not sure if my seminar with @ScotMcKay is on or off. I thought we were only planning it. But I'm ready..
Oh I love the internet - somebody very dear to my heart, who i lost contact with found me today on facebook!
Just finished reading a great FREE ebook on how to build a business & not just a blog. http://www.richbeyondwords.com/buildbusiness.html
Hello twitter friends, enjoying the silence & getting into video. Traffic geyser is great for video distribution.
Figuring out why the latest version of the flock browser does not like my Lap Top
